mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo (todo_id, todo_work, todo_pmember, todo_content, todo_sdate, todo_edate, todo_complet, todo_eedate, todo_color) VALUES (todo_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{todo_work}, #{todo_pmember}, #{todo_content}, #{todo_sdate}, null, 'N', #{todo_eedate}, '#F78181')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT todo_id, todo_content, todo_pmember, (SELECT m.member_profile FROM member m WHERE member_name = todo_pmember) member_profile, todo_sdate, todo_eedate, todo_complet, todo_issue, todo_work FROM todo INNER JOIN work ON todo_work = work_id WHERE work_project = ${workVo.work_project} AND work_id = ${workVo.work_id} ORDER BY todo_sdate DESC ) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${pageVo.page} * ${pageVo.pageSize} - (${pageVo.pageSize} - 1) AND ${pageVo.page} * ${pageVo.pageSize} ORDER BY rnum
